title: Brussels Sprout Salad
summary: Brussels Sprout Salad might be just the side dish you are searching for. One portion of this dish contains roughly 8g of protein, 15g of fat, and a total of 226 calories. This recipe serves 2 and costs $1.8 per serving. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. A mixture of brussels sprouts - then shredded/chiffonaded, dijon mustard, sea salt and ground pepper, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. It is a good option if you're following a caveman, gluten free, primal, and whole 30 diet. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 91%. This score is super. Similar recipes include Brussels Sprout Salad, Brussels Sprout Salad, and Twist and Sprout: Brussels Sprout and Bacon Pizza.
